mapper.update: update user_info set n_onlineFlag = #{param2} where n_roleId = #{param1}
update user_info set s_password = #{param2} where s_phone = #{param1}
update user_info set s_roleAccount = #{roleAccount}, s_name = #{name}, n_age = #{age},n_weight = #{weight}, s_sex = #{sex} where n_roleId = #{roleId}
update user_info set s_headImg = #{param1} where n_roleId = #{param2}

update meal_info set s_mealName=#{mealName}, n_targetEnergy=#{targetEnergy}, s_describe=#{description}, n_per_carbohydrate=#{per_carbohydrate}, n_per_protein=#{per_protein}, n_per_fat=#{per_fat}, n_per_zao=#{per_zao},n_per_zhong=#{per_zhong}, n_per_wan=#{per_wan}, n_dayEnergy=#{dayEnergy}, n_dayCHO=#{dayCHO},n_dayProtein=#{dayProtein},n_dayFat=#{dayFat} where n_mealId = #{mealId}
update meal_made set n_num = #{num} where n_mealId = #{mealId} and n_foodId = #{foodId} and n_mealType = #{mealType}
mapper.select: select n_roleId roleId from user_info where s_phone = #{param1}

select n_roleId roleId,s_roleAccount roleAccount,s_name name,s_password password,n_age age,n_weight weight, s_sex sex,s_phone phone,d_createTime createTime,s_headImg headImg, n_onlineFlag onlineFlag from user_info where n_roleId = #{param1}

select n_roleId roleId,s_roleAccount roleAccount,s_name name,s_password password,n_age age,n_weight weight, s_sex sex,s_phone phone,d_createTime createTime,s_headImg headImg, n_onlineFlag onlineFlag from user_info where s_phone = #{param1} and s_password = #{param2}

select n_foodId foodId, s_foodName foodName,n_typeId typeId,n_eat_part eat_part,n_energy energy,n_moisture moisture, n_protein protein,n_fat fat,n_fiber fiber,n_carbohydrate carbohydrate,n_va va,n_vb1 vb1,n_vb2 vb2,n_niacin niacin, n_ve ve,n_Na na,n_Ca ca,n_Fe fe,n_vc vc,n_cholesterol cholesterol from food_info where n_delFlag = 1

select n_foodId foodId, s_foodName foodName,n_typeId typeId,n_eat_part eat_part,n_energy energy,n_moisture moisture, n_protein protein,n_fat fat,n_fiber fiber,n_carbohydrate carbohydrate,n_va va,n_vb1 vb1,n_vb2 vb2,n_niacin niacin, n_ve ve,n_Na na,n_Ca ca,n_Fe fe,n_vc vc,n_cholesterol cholesterol from food_info where n_delFlag = 1 and n_foodId = #{param1}
select count(*) from meal_info where n_roleId = #{param1}

select n_mealId mealId,s_mealName mealName, n_targetEnergy targetEnergy, s_describe description,n_per_carbohydrate per_carbohydrate, n_per_protein per_protein, n_per_fat per_fat,n_per_zao per_zao,n_per_zhong per_zhong, n_per_wan per_wan, n_dayEnergy dayEnergy, n_dayCHO dayCHO,n_dayProtein dayProtein,n_dayFat dayFat,d_createTime createTime from meal_info where n_roleId = #{param1} order by d_createTime desc
select n_foodId foodId, n_mealId mealId,n_foodId foodId,n_num num,n_mealType mealType from meal_made where n_mealId = #{param1}
select n_mealId mealId from meal_info where n_roleId = #{param1} and DATE_FORMAT( d_createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') order by d_createTime desc limit 0,1

select n_mealId mealId,s_mealName mealName, n_targetEnergy targetEnergy, s_describe description,n_per_carbohydrate per_carbohydrate, n_per_protein per_protein, n_per_fat per_fat,n_per_zao per_zao,n_per_zhong per_zhong, n_per_wan per_wan, n_dayEnergy dayEnergy, n_dayCHO dayCHO,n_dayProtein dayProtein,n_dayFat dayFat,d_createTime createTime from meal_info where n_mealId = #{param1}
select n_id id, n_mealId mealId, n_foodId foodId, n_num num, n_mealType n_mealType from meal_made where n_mealId = #{param1} and n_foodId = #{param2} and n_mealType = #{param3}
select n_id id, n_foodId foodId from meal_made where n_mealId = #{param1} and n_mealType = #{param2}
select n_foodId foodId from food_info where s_foodName = #{param1}
